channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Classified Listing – Classified ads & Business Directory Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Classified Listing – Classified ads & Business Directory Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-2654|2024-08-03T00:46:03.475Z -- unknown -- classified%20listing%20%E2%80%93%20classified%20ads%20%26%20business%20directory%20plugin
item.description: The Classima WordPress theme before 2.1.11 and some of its required plugins (Classified Listing before 2.2.14, Classified Listing Pro before 2.0.20, Classified Listing Store & Membership before 1.4.20 and Classima Core before 1.10) do not escape a parameter before outputting it back in attributes, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
